name: Nasuverse Card Game
description:
Nasuverse Card Game. This is the Nasuverse card game, based on the Type-Moon universe, featuring Tsukihime, Kara no Kyoukai, Mahoyo, and Fate!

Collect cards, build decks, and compete for ranks. Uses the Hearthstone ruleset. A tested game and balance, but new!

Although inspired by Hearthstone, nasuverse has a totally different rarity philosophy. No pay to win. We carefully constructed plan our rarity to make the most useful and powerful cards the most common. We create rare and mythic rare cards for collectors and for fans. Basic decks are constantly updated to be top tier.
